sfdc:query.query: dsql:SELECT Id, Name, Amount, StageName, Probability, CloseDate, Account.Id, Account.Name FROM Opportunity WHERE Account.Id <> null

netsuite:query-records.query: dsql:SELECT internalId FROM CUSTOMER WHERE companyName = '#[payload.Account.Name]'
netsuite:query-records.doc:name: Query Customer in Netsuite
